item.title: 2022-08-28 Calling Andre While Doing EA Work
item.description: 2022-08-28 Calling Andre While Doing EA Work Talking about [[Keep Your Identity Small|keeping our identity small]], Silicon Valley “Change the World” Culture, and increasing embrace of virtue and doing things for yourself.

item.title: Call with Elizabeth Edwards-Appell
item.description: Call with Elizabeth Edwards-Appell Working in the [[Executive Branch]] (as an organization appointee or someone who climbs the ranks) If [[Software Engineering]], data like Data for Progress can work.

item.title: [[2022-06-10]] Call with Kalkidan
item.description: [[2022-06-10]] Call with Kalkidan • Grew up in Ethiopia and Uganda, did work in development. Founded an organization for women’s health in Ethiopia.

item.title: [[2022-05-29]] Recalling My Origin Story with Carrie to Nicole and Bryce
item.description: [[2022-05-29]] Recalling My Origin Story with Carrie to Nicole and Bryce [[How Carrie and I Met]] [[It is Easier to Change the Polarity of an Emotion Than to Change Its Magnitude|Enemies to Lovers]]

item.title: [[2022-02-25]] Call with Lily
item.description: [[2022-02-25]] Call with Lily Self studied real analysis [[Peak-End Rule]] analysis and nostalgia and suffering and [[Peak-End Rule|Narration versus Experience]] Every feeling has a mapping to the narration and experience Pain is good because it helps you feel happy and seek happiness If you are a util do you think grieving is worth it?
